snippet.title: Salmonella Outbreak: Government Shutdown to Blame?
snippet.description:
Salmonella Outbreak: Government Shutdown to Blame?
Toegevoegd door NewsyVideos laatste oktober
At least 18 states and almost 300 people have gotten sick from salmonella. But with two-thirds of CDC employees furloughed it's hard to contain.
158 views

snippet.title: CDC Declares Drug-Resistant Salmonella Outbreak
snippet.description:
CDC Declares Drug-Resistant Salmonella Outbreak
Toegevoegd door NewsyVideos laatste oktober
A multistate drug-resistant salmonella outbreak has landed 42 percent of victims in the hospital. Nearly 280 people have gotten sick.
42 views

snippet.title: Salmonella outbreak: USDA may close plants involved
snippet.description:
Salmonella outbreak: USDA may close plants involved
Toegevoegd door CBS News laatste oktober
The Agriculture Department is threatening to close three poultry plants owned by Foster Farms in California. The plants are linked to a nationwide outbreak of salmonella. Norah O'Donnell reports.
5 views

snippet.title: Salmonella-tainted chicken still being sold
snippet.description:
Salmonella-tainted chicken still being sold
Toegevoegd door CBS News laatste oktober
State health officials in California have yet to announce a recall of raw chicken linked to a salmonella outbreak. The chicken is believed to have come from three separate plants run by Foster Farms in California, and has made more than 300 people sick. CBS News' Bigad Shaban reports.
27 views

snippet.title: Salmonella Closes Clover Food Labs in Boston
snippet.description:
Salmonella Closes Clover Food Labs in Boston
Toegevoegd door Tony Coveny laatste juli
A salmonella outbreak has forced Clover Food Labs to close, and now the owner says he may know the source of the salmonella. He has pointed to pita bread or tahini, humus and tomato salad as the likely sources based upon interview materials he has seen. The Boston Salmonella outbreak has been linked to 31 confirmed cases and there are likely many more. For more information, see www.foodrecallsinamerica.com
19 views

snippet.title: Proctor and Gamble pet food recall linked to salmonella
snippet.description:
Proctor and Gamble pet food recall linked to salmonella
Toegevoegd door CBS News laatste oktober
Proctor and Gamble says that salmonella turned up in some of its varieties of dry pet food during random testing at a single manufacturing site. WCBS-TV's Dave Carlin reports.
66 views

snippet.title: Salmonella scare in 7 states
snippet.description:
Salmonella scare in 7 states
Toegevoegd door CBS News laatste september
Seven states are pulling lettuce from their shelves due to possible salmonella poisoning.
14 views

snippet.title: Salmonella outbreak: Plants remain open despite link
snippet.description:
Salmonella outbreak: Plants remain open despite link
Toegevoegd door CBS News laatste oktober
The USDA threatened to close three Foster Farms processing plants in California that have been linked to an outbreak of salmonella. But the USDA has agreed the plants could remain open after the company presented the government with plans to combat the spread. CBS News correspondent John Blackstone reports.
26 views

snippet.title: McDonald's Pulls Tomatoes From Menu Amid Salmonella Fears
snippet.description:
McDonald's Pulls Tomatoes From Menu Amid Salmonella Fears
Toegevoegd door Local News 3 jaren geleden
(Dallas, TX) -- McDonald's pulls most tomatoes from its menu in an effort to help fight off the salmonella outbreak.
111 views

snippet.title: Cantaloupe Salmonella Outbreak Traced to Indiana
snippet.description:
Cantaloupe Salmonella Outbreak Traced to Indiana
Toegevoegd door tvnportal vorig jaar
Cantaloupe salmonella outbreak traced to Indiana after two people died in Kentucky. Twenty states are affected and at least 140 people are sick.Powered by NewsLook.com Producer : Newsy
31 views
